text: Sam Fields (1916–1954), sometimes credited as Sammy Fields, was an American film editor.Blottner p.48 ==Selected filmography== * Whistling Hills (1951) * Texas Lawmen (1951) * Stagecoach Driver (1951) * Montana Incident (1952) * Fargo (1952) * Waco (1952) * Dead Man's Trail (1952) * The Gunman (1952) * Texas City (1952) * Jungle Gents (1954) * The Desperado (1954) *The Human Jungle (1954) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Blottner, Gene. Wild Bill Elliott: A Complete Filmography. McFarland, 2007. ==External links== * Category:1916 births Category:1954 deaths Category:American film directors
title: Sam Fields
